item.description:
Want to try Kayaking ? Then please join me for a nice paddle up the merrimack river. We will meet at Edgewater Canoe and Kayak. They have many boats from 10-14', single and double ups.

Bring a lunch and we will paddle up to the park, take a break to eat and paddle back. It will be approx. 2-3 hours.

The cost is only $5/hr

So bring your sunscreen, water, and smiling faces.

I will help the beginners to get started.

Rain will cancel this event

Any questions...Cindy 603-315-0275
item.how_to_find_us: meet me at the boat ramp

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Easy kayaking
